Body:
in_list = ['a', 'b', 'c']
fmt = 'netcdf'
cl = 5
prefix = 'pre.'
suffix = '.suf.nc'
metadata = []
spec = specification.Specifier(infiles=in_list, ncfmt=fmt, compression=cl,
    prefix=prefix, suffix=suffix, metadata=metadata)
spec.validate_types()
self.assertRaises(ValueError, spec.validate_values)
